description.value: Any shield you wield gains the shove trait. When you @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Shove]{Shove} using a shield and Stride as part of that action, you can move an additional 5 feet to either side of the creature you Shoved. In addition, if you are in the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Everstand Stance]{Everstand Stance} and successfully Shove a creature using a shield that you wield two-handed, you can increase the distance of your Shove to 10 feet.
